query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS platform_trials (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, trial_end_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, trial_type VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'regular', created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UNIQUE(user_id, platform));
